Package net.etfbl.pj2.statistics

Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
net.etfbl.pj2.statistics.Statistics
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStatistics
public class Statistics extends Object implements IStatistics
Class for calculating statistics related to rentals and expenses.

2.6.2024.
